    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public static void insert(MapDBTransaction tx,
                          java.lang.String branchName,
                          java.lang.String keyspaceName,
                          java.lang.String matrixName,
                          long timestamp)
        Performs an insertion into the Navigation Map.
        Parameters:
        tx - The transaction to work on. Must not be null, must be open.
        branchName - The name of the branch to insert. Must not be null.
        keyspaceName - The name of the keyspace to insert. Must not be null.
        matrixName - The name of the matrix to insert. Must not be null.
        timestamp - The timestamp at which to create the matrix. Must not be negative.

      • existsBranch

        public static boolean existsBranch(MapDBTransaction tx,
                                   java.lang.String branchName)
        Checks if the branch with the given name exists in the Navigation Map.
        Parameters:
        tx - The transaction to work on. Must not be null, must be open.
        branchName - The name of the branch to check existence for. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        true if there exists a branch with the given name, otherwise false.

      • branchNames

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> branchNames(MapDBTransaction tx)
        Returns the names of all branches in the Navigation Map.
        Parameters:
        tx - The transaction to work on. Must not be null, must be open.
        Returns:
        An immutable set of branch names. May be empty, but never null.

      • deleteBranch

        public static void deleteBranch(MapDBTransaction tx,
                                java.lang.String branchName)
                         throws ChronoDBBranchingException
        Deletes the branch with the given name from the Navigation Map.
        Parameters:
        tx - The transaction to work on. Must not be null, must be open.
        branchName - The name of the branch to delete. Must not be null. Must refer to an existing branch.
        Throws:
        ChronoDBBranchingException - Thrown if there is no branch with the given name.

      • getKeyspaceMetadata

        public static java.util.Set<KeyspaceMetadata> getKeyspaceMetadata(MapDBTransaction tx,
                                                                  java.lang.String branchName)
                                                           throws ChronoDBBranchingException
        Returns the map from keyspace name to matrix map name for the given branch.
        Parameters:
        tx - The transaction to work on. Must not be null, must be open.
        branchName - The name of the branch to get the keyspace-to-matrix-name map for. Must not be null, must refer to an existing branch.
        Returns:
        The metadata for all known keyspaces in the given branch.
        Throws:
        ChronoDBBranchingException - Thrown if there is no branch with the given name.
